website.title: Website Development
website.description: We design and build responsive, user-friendly websites that reflect your brand and drive engagement. From landing pages to full corporate sites, we ensure performance, accessibility, and modern design standards.

webapp.title: Web App Development
webapp.description: Our team develops robust and scalable web applications tailored to your business needs. Using modern frameworks and best practices, we create secure, high-performance solutions for everything from dashboards to complex SaaS platforms.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: We build cross-platform and native mobile apps that deliver smooth user experiences on both iOS and Android. Whether for internal use or public release, we turn your ideas into powerful, intuitive mobile solutions.

training.title: Training
training.description: We provide hands-on, real-world IT training tailored to teams and individuals. Covering topics from web and mobile development to system administration and security, our programs empower learners to build practical, job-ready skills.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded last year, Kreatale began with a simple mission: to help businesses realize their dreams through innovative technology solutions. What started as a small team of passionate developers has quickly grown into a dynamic digital agency serving clients worldwide.
story.description1: We understand that behind every business idea lies a dream - a vision of what could be. Our mission is to bridge the gap between imagination and implementation.
story.description2: Through cutting-edge technology and creative problem-solving, we transform your business dreams into powerful digital solutions that drive real results.

dreams.title: Realizing Dreams Through Technology
dreams.description: At Kreatale, we believe every business has a dream. Whether it's launching a new product, expanding to new markets, or revolutionizing an industry, we're here to turn those dreams into digital reality.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: FAQ
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our services and processes.

questions.question: What services does Kreatale offer?
questions.answer: We specialize in web development, mobile app development, custom web applications, WordPress customization, and UI/UX design. We create fast, modern, and scalable digital solutions tailored to your business needs.

questions.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
questions.answer: Project timelines vary depending on complexity. A simple website typically takes 2-4 weeks, while complex web applications can take 2-6 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

questions.question: What is your development process?
questions.answer: Our process includes discovery & planning, design & prototyping, development & testing, and deployment & maintenance. We maintain clear communication throughout each phase and provide regular updates.

questions.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer various support packages including maintenance, updates, security monitoring, and performance optimization. We can also provide training for your team to manage the website.

questions.question: What technologies do you use?
questions.answer: We use modern technologies including Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and other cutting-edge tools. We choose the best technology stack based on your project requirements and goals.

questions.question: Can you work with existing websites?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We can redesign, rebuild, or enhance existing websites. We'll analyze your current site and recommend improvements to enhance performance, user experience, and conversion rates.

questions.question: How do you handle project communication?
questions.answer: We use project management tools, regular video calls, and detailed progress reports. You'll have a dedicated project manager and direct access to our development team throughout the project.

questions.question: What makes Kreatale different from other agencies?
questions.answer: We focus on creating high-performance, scalable solutions with clean code and modern design. Our team combines technical expertise with business understanding to deliver solutions that drive real results.

questions.question: Do you provide hosting and domain services?
questions.answer: Yes, we can help with hosting setup, domain registration, SSL certificates, and ongoing server management. We recommend reliable hosting providers that ensure optimal performance.

questions.question: How do you ensure website security?
questions.answer: We implement security best practices including HTTPS, secure authentication, regular updates, and security monitoring. We also provide security audits and recommendations for ongoing protection.
